events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it as it doesn't meet my expectations. Please guide me on how to get a refund.
System has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning return and refund.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further with your return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return, so I can process the refund promptly?
My order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the product did not match the description on your website.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process; you will receive the money back in 5-7 business days once the return is confirmed.
Thanks for handling this quickly! I appreciate your help with the refund process.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that the refund amount has been credited to your account. Please contact us if there are any issues.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for reaching out, and have a great day!
